thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Ms Laura Moylan
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Ms Laura Moylan

author: Ms Laura Moylan
title: Ms Laura Moylan
text:
Really happy with items prices and delivery. The only problem was the way the items were packaged. All 4 tops were stuffed into random bags and creased heavily. As they were bought as a gift I had to iron them before gifting them.
Otherwise I am very happy
.
